column1: Delicious Tostadas all of them prepared by the owners every day. A most you cannot miss. And you can also have all the food to take away.
Very good atmosphere, and very good food. Everything nice. The guacamole and the tortillas delicious.

La comida deliciosa en un ambiente informal, pero al mismo tiempo muy agradable. El personal súper amable y servicial. No dudo en recomendarlo.
La comida y el servicio excelentes. Oliver Torres un magnífico anfitrión, quien nos explicó cada platillo. Pedimos el pato Peking riquísimo. Sin lugar a duda ...
Delicious food. Service as always; extraordinary. Every visit to Madrid have to go. The Spanish tortilla, meat and tomato salad are outstanding
The food is great. The pasta is always perfectly cooked. “AL DENTE” Always go when in Puerto Vallarta.
